Item.Name: LocalizableStrings.DeleteMeetingWithInvitationsConfirmationMessage.Value
Item.Value: Are you sure that you want to delete the selected record? All participants will receive a meeting update. Please confirm that you want to proceed.

Item.Name: LocalizableStrings.GenerateReportWithoutFiltersConfirmationMessage.Value
Item.Value: Le rapport sera généré pour tous les enregistrements de la section, sans filtres. Voulez-vous continuer?

Item.Name: LocalizableStrings.MultiDeleteMeetingWithInvitationsConfirmationMessage.Value
Item.Value: Are you sure that you want to delete the selected records? All participants will receive a meeting update. Please confirm that you want to proceed.

Item.Name: LocalizableStrings.SynchronizeWithExchangeStart.Value
Item.Value: La synchronisation a démarré. Vous serez informé lorsqu'elle sera terminée.

Item.Name: LocalizableStrings.SyncSettingsSetTipCaption.Value
Item.Value:
Désormais, vos rendez-vous et activités seront toujours à jour!
